DOC.brief_title: A Study Of A New Medicine ( GW679769 ) For The Treatment Of Social Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Patients Generalized Social Anxiety Disorder primary diagnosis . If female , must commit consistent correct use acceptable method birth control . Patients psychiatric disorder primary diagnosis within 6 month prior screen . Patients Body Dysmophic Disorder , Schizophrenia , Schizoaffective Disorder , Bipolar Disorder . Patients pose current suicidal homicidal risk make suicide attempt within past 6 month ever homicidal . Patients positive urine test screen illegal drug use and/or history substance abuse dependence ( alcohol drug ) within past 12 month . Patients unstable medical disorder . Female patient pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant specified time study . Patients take psychoactive medication .
